_header: As Jesu among the Jews stood
_description: Gospel for Thursday after Passion Sunday, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: Als ihesu crist omang þe iews stodeAnd spake to þam with mild mode…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …When þis was done þe folk gan fareIn to þaire howses and spak no mare
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Cum audissent quidam de turba.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia v proxima secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 64rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.152-154.
